oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Smoky Mountain Railroad time table
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Smoky Mountain Railroad
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Smoky Mountain Railroad. KNOXVILLE AND SEVIERVILLE, TENNESSEE. TIME TABLE NO. 5 (Effective 12:01 A. M. Central Time) Monday, July 21, 1947. F.L. Sparks, Superintendent. The train between Knoxville and Sevierville was known as the "Slow and Easy."
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Railroads; Ephemera; Schedules (Time plans);
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
